trans-unit.source: Show these channels in the front end form.
trans-unit.target: Prikažite ove kanale u obrascu na frontenda.

trans-unit.source: Please select one or more channels.
Do not show the channel selection menu.
trans-unit.target: Nemojte prikazivati izbornik za odabir kanala.

trans-unit.source: You can use the wildcards ##channels## (channel names), ##domain## (domain name) and ##link## (activation link).
trans-unit.target: Možete koristiti wildcards ##channels## (nazivi kanala), ##domain## (naziv domene) i ##link## (aktivacijski link).

trans-unit.source: You can use the wildcards ##channels## (channel names) and ##domain## (domain name).
trans-unit.target: Možete koristiti wildcards ##channels## (nazivi kanala) i ##domain## (naziv domene)

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the newsletter template.

You have subscribed to the following channels on ##domain##:
##channels##
Please click ##link## to activate your subscription. If you did not subscribe yourself, please ignore this e-mail.
trans-unit.target: Pretplatili ste se na slijedeće kanale na ##domain##: ##channels## Molimo vas da kliknete na ##link## i aktivirate vašu pretplatu. Ako se vi osobno niste pretplatili na ove kanale, molimo vas da ignorirate ovu E-mail poruku.

trans-unit.source:
You have unsubscribed from the following channels on ##domain##:
##channels##
trans-unit.target: Odjavili ste pretplatu na slijedeće kanale na ##domain##: ##channels##
